resources.string: Quick access to the next Colombian holiday from your home screen
You’ll receive a notification on the holiday if this option is enabled.
This holiday is in the past
Please turn on notifications to receive notifications
🎉 Use the widget to check holidays faster

Add a widget to your home screen to instantly see if today is a holiday and when the next one is — no need to open the app. \n\n Just long-press on your home screen, select “Widgets”, and look for Colombian Holidays.
